import React from 'react';
import {v4 as uuid } from "uuid";
import {Form, Col, Button, Row} from "react-bootstrap"

const AddNewArtist = ({closeAddNewFormCB}) => {
   
    const addArtistHandler = async (artist) =>{
        const request = {
            id: uuid(),
            ...artist
        }

        const response = await api.post("/artist",request)
    }
   
   
   
    return (
        <Form>
        <Row>
            <Form.Group as={Col} controlId="formGridName">
            <Form.Label>Name</Form.Label>
            <Form.Control placeholder="Enter Artits Name" />
            </Form.Group>

            <Form.Group as={Col} controlId="formGridType">
            <Form.Label>Type</Form.Label>
            <Form.Control as="select" defaultValue="Singer">
                <option>Singer</option>
                <option>Compositors</option>
                <option>Band</option>
            </Form.Control>
            </Form.Group>
        </Row>

        <Form.Group controlId="formGridBirthName">
            <Form.Label>Birth Name</Form.Label>
            <Form.Control />
        </Form.Group>


        <Form.Group as={Col} controlId="formGridGenre">
            <Form.Label>Genre</Form.Label>
            <Form.Control />
            </Form.Group>

        <Row>
            <Form.Group as={Col} controlId="formGridCity">
            <Form.Label>City</Form.Label>
            <Form.Control />
            </Form.Group>



            <Form.Group as={Col} controlId="formGridState">
            <Form.Label>State</Form.Label>
            <Form.Control as="select" defaultValue="Choose...">
                <option>Choose...</option>
                <option>...</option>
            </Form.Control>
            </Form.Group>

          
        </Row>

  
       
    <Button   variant="primary" type="submit">
        Submit
    </Button>
    <Button  variant="worning" type="close"  onClick={()=>closeAddNewFormCB}>
        Cancel
    </Button>

   
</Form>

    )
}

export default AddNewArtist
